reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater looks identical to the photo and appreciate its quality, comfort, and soft, luxurious material that isn't scratchy or itchy. They like the fit, with one customer noting it's loose enough not to be clingy, and the color variety with many options to choose from. The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfectly oversized, others mention it's way too short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This sweater is great. It is soooo soft and a thinner material, so it’s warm but not too warm. Super cute to wear with jeans or over a workout outfit. The size is oversized, I am a medium and got a medium and it fit great. It washed well on gentle and then air dry. Overall, durable and very comfy! I have it tucked up in this video, it went down past my waste before I tucked it. Read more
items.author: savannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: Ordered two more, different colors. Washes well and then I let hang dry. Quality! Not thin but not too thick either. Sizing is perfect, large for me. Looks great and fits well and I love it. Nice colors. Read more
items.author: Vicki A. Risser

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect beautiful sweater
items.body: This sweater is absolutely amazing! The first time I wore it I got compliments. I was at a hospital, a woman actually gave me her phone no to share the link! It is true to size. It is really soft and so comfortable. I wore it with leggings. I am 5'2" and 135 . I just gained 10 lbs ( quit smoking).. So I ordered a large it is perfect. It is different, definitely buy it. I ordered two more and they were already delivered. Read more
items.author: Camille S.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater, but not a great Free People Uptown dupe
items.body: I bought this as a dupe for the Free People Uptown Stripe Pullover, and it is definitely different, but I think I like this better. The material is softer, stretchier and thinner than the FP version, which I prefer. It doesn’t fit differently. Not a bad fit, but just different to FP. That’s why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5, because even tho I like it more than the FP version, if you are looking for a dupe, other than the pattern, this is not it. Read more
items.author: Bryan Crawford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase. Would order again
items.body: Only wore this once and got so many compliments on it. It's beautiful and soft. Material is great quality. Nice and warm. Wanting to order other colors too. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Marie Hill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect pop of color!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Medium weight sweater that is so cute! Super soft fabric that’s breathable and comfortable. Love the balloon sleeve and the cuffed band around the wrist to give it shape. It’s slightly oversized so you don’t need to size up but I did because I like that. Easy to tuck or leave untucked. Great quality fabric and love the fun vibe it adds to a wardrobe! Ordered a large Read more
items.author: Jolene Ehlers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Dang CUTE
items.body: This sweater is absolutely adorable and I'm quite impressed by the quality! Love the subtle length difference in the back vs the front and the color is so bright and fun! I receive NUMEROUS compliments on this sweater every time I wear it. Incredibly comfy but still looks put together. Have washed it twice in warm water and hung it up to dry. Came out perfect each time and I hit it with an iron or steamer if I notice a wrinkle. No issues with that process either! No color bleeding, snagging, strings, or holes. 100/10 recommend! For reference, I'm 5'6 and 250 lbs, and ordered the XXL. I think I could have gotten away with the XL but I like the more oversized look of the XXL. Read more
items.author: Erin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size down!!! Rather itchy!
items.body: Honestly I might feel a little bit different about it if I wasn't legitimately swimming in it haha I know it's supposed to be over-sized. But I know THAT was not what they meant: SIZE DOWN!! Even if Amazon recommends a certain size...don't believe it. Size down. Also the material was rather itchy, don't know if I'll replace. I feel like this sweater is supposed to be kind of loud, even though I got grey,(not super loud at all), I thought it would have at least a little pizazz. None. Maybe a different color if I try again but I don't know if I can get past how itchy the material was. Read more
items.author: Zoey Abel

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Red, 1-black, Khaki, White, Blue, Army Green, 1-green, Navy Blue, Orange, 1-pink, Grey, 1-brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
